    Mato Kormuth

    • Constructor Detail

      • InventoryMenuItem

        public InventoryMenuItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
                 Action action,
                 int slot,
                 boolean closeAfterClick)
        Creates new Inventory menu item from specified params.
        Parameters:
        item - itemstack to use as icon.
        action - action to execute when player clicks icon.
        slot - slot in inventory, where the itemstack should be.
        closeAfterClick - boolean, that specify, if the menu should close after click on this item.
